name: Valiant Shield
description:
Defend the hero from the zombie malice!

  • Click/tap to zoom, then tap/click to fire. 
  • Use spacebar or the zoom out button to zoom out.

Game should play on mobile and desktop browsers.  Make sure your device is in landscape before loading the game, the URL bar may cause full screen issues.

This demo is a portion of the full game, currently only available on Google Play:
